name: Home (itch) (lunadyedred, Hellion Anarchist, TheProphetOfRa, russcork)
description:
A simple game about making the townsfolk happy.

Click and hold to see what they want, drag them around to put them where they want to be.

  • LunaDyedRed - Art, Design
  • HellionAnarchist - Art
  • TheProphetOfRa - Code
  • RussCork - Audio

Game Jam entry built in 2 days
